scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:404" "npm run start:back" "npm run start:bff" "npm run start:drawer" "npm run start:root" "npm run start:videos"
scripts.test:all: concurrently "npm run test:404" "npm run test:back" "npm run test:bff" "npm run test:drawer" "npm run test:root" "npm run test:videos"
scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm run install:404" "npm run install:back" "npm run install:bff" "npm run install:drawer" "npm run install:root" "npm run install:videos"
scripts.start-and-test-all: npm run test:all && npm run start:all
